page.title: 15Village Hall, Great Orton
page.content: This large hall, seating 200 people and situated in the centre of the village, was built in 1958-9. The money was raised by public subscriptions and numerous efforts by the villages. It has ample parking space. The building is used for many different things such as: whist drives, concerts, film shows, plays, dances, coffee evenings, wedding receptions and funeral 'teas'. The senior citizens known as the Autumn Club, hold their meetings here as does the Womens Institute. There are 2 badminton clubs, a junior and senior, who regularly use the hall. The school lease the hall 2 afternoons a week for physical education and drama work.
